title: JSON schema for JSInspect configuration files

identifiers.description: A flag indicating whether to limit the search to nodes with matching identifiers

ignore.description: A regular expression used for matching paths to ignore

jsx.description: A flag indicating whether to process JSX files

reporter.description: The name of the reporter to be used

suppress.description: The number of lines at which diffs should be suppressed. A value of 0 is off.

threshold.description: A threshold determining the smallest subset of nodes to analyze
